Package hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.services

Class BalanceService

java.lang.Object
hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.services.BalanceService
All Implemented Interfaces:
BalanceService
@Service public class BalanceService extends Object implements BalanceService
Service class for handling balance-related operations.

      Constructor for BalanceService.
      Parameters:

      currencyRepository - CurrencyRepository for accessing currency data.
      balanceRepository - BalanceRepository for accessing balance data.
      currencyExchangeService - CurrencyExchangeService for currency conversion.
      balanceMapper - BalanceMapper for mapping between DTOs and entities.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • subtractMoney

      @Transactional public BalanceDto subtractMoney(Long id, Double amountToSubtract)
      Subtracts money from the balance with the specified ID.
      Specified by:
      subtractMoney in interface BalanceService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the balance.
      amountToSubtract - The amount of money to subtract.
      Returns:
      BalanceDto containing the updated balance information.
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the balance is insufficient and payments without funds are not allowed.

    • transferMoney

      @Transactional public BalanceDto transferMoney(Long balanceFromId, Long balanceToId, Double amount)
      Transfers money from one balance to another.
      Specified by:
      transferMoney in interface BalanceService
      Parameters:
      balanceFromId - The ID of the balance to transfer money from.
      balanceToId - The ID of the balance to transfer money to.
      amount - The amount of money to transfer.
      Returns:
      BalanceDto containing the updated balance information of the recipient balance.

    • getBalancesForUser

      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
